text: Alan Hammond (19 March 1912 – 13 May 1981) was a former Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Alan Hammond's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1912 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Alan Hammond
